trans-unit.source: This is just a normal play definition, operating on the webservers group. The serial keyword tells Ansible how many servers to operate on at once. If it’s not specified, Ansible will parallelize these operations up to the default “forks” limit specified in the configuration file. But for a zero-downtime rolling upgrade, you may not want to operate on that many hosts at once. If you had just a handful of webservers, you may want to set serial to 1, for one host at a time. If you have 100, maybe you could set serial to 10, for ten at a time.
trans-unit.target: 这只是在 webservers 组上运行的常规播放定义。该 serial 关键字告诉Ansible多少服务器在一次操作上。如果未指定，Ansible将并行执行这些操作，直到配置文件中指定的默认“ forks”限制。但是对于零停机滚动升级，您可能不想一次在那么多主机上进行操作。如果只有几个Web服务器，则可能希望一次将一台主机的 serial 设置为1。如果您有100个，也许您可​​以一次将 serial 设置为10，一次十个。

trans-unit.source: This is useful and should only be done in a few cases. A common case is installing python on a system without python installed by default. trans-unit.source: This lookup will use an existing 1Password session if one exists. trans-unit.source: This loops over all of the hosts in the group called monitoring, and adds an ACCEPT line for each monitoring hosts’ default IPv4 address to the current machine’s iptables configuration, so that Nagios can monitor those hosts.

trans-unit.source: This makes a dynamic group of hosts matching certain criteria, even if that group is not defined in the inventory file:

trans-unit.source: This makes it clear to the playbook reader that you’ve made a conscious choice to override some default in the role, or pass in some configuration that the role can’t assume by itself. It also allows you to pass something site-specific that isn’t really part of the role you are sharing with others.
trans-unit.target: 这对剧本阅读器很清楚，您已经做出了明智的选择，以覆盖角色中的某些默认值，或者传递角色无法自行承担的某些配置。它还允许您传递特定于站点的内容，这实际上并不是您与他人共享的角色的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This makes the temporary files created on the machine to be world readable and will issue a warning instead of failing the task. It is useful when becoming an unprivileged user.

trans-unit.source: This module allows Ansible to interface with the PubNub BLOCKS infrastructure by providing the following operations: create / remove, start / stop and rename for blocks and create / modify / remove for event handlers
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许Ansible通过提供以下操作与PubNub BLOCKS基础架构进行对接:创建/删除,启动/停止和重命名区块,创建/修改/删除事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This module allows a server team to provision server network ports for new servers without having to access Arista CVP or asking the network team to do it for them. Provide the information for connecting to CVP, switch rack, port the new server is connected to, optional vlan, and an action and the module will apply the configuration to the switch port via CVP. Actions are add (applies template config to port), remove (defaults the interface config) and show (returns the current port config).
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许服务器团队为新服务器配置服务器网络端口,而无需访问Arista CVP或要求网络团队代为配置。提供连接到CVP的信息、交换机机架、新服务器连接的端口、可选的vlan和一个操作,该模块将通过CVP将配置应用到交换机端口。动作有添加(将模板配置应用到端口)、删除(默认接口配置)和显示(返回当前端口配置)。

trans-unit.source: This module allows the administration of Keycloak client templates via the Keycloak REST API. It requires access to the REST API via OpenID Connect; the user connecting and the client being used must have the requisite access rights. In a default Keycloak installation, admin-cli and an admin user would work, as would a separate client definition with the scope tailored to your needs and a user having the expected roles.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许通过Keycloak REST API管理Keycloak客户端模板。它需要通过OpenID Connect访问REST API;连接的用户和使用的客户端必须具有必要的访问权限。在默认的Keycloak安装中,admin-cli和一个管理员用户可以工作,一个单独的客户端定义也可以工作,其范围根据您的需求定制,用户具有预期的角色。

trans-unit.source: This module allows the management of AWS Lambda function bucket event mappings via the Ansible framework. trans-unit.target: 该模块允许通过Ansible框架管理AWS Lambda函数存储桶事件映射。使用模块community.aws.lambda管理lambda函数本身，使用community.aws.lambda_alias管理函数别名，使用community.aws.lambda_policy修改lambda权限。

trans-unit.source: This module allows the management of AWS Lambda function bucket event mappings via the Ansible framework. Use module lambda to manage the lambda function itself, lambda_alias to manage function aliases and lambda_policy to modify lambda permissions.

trans-unit.source: This module allows the management of AWS Lambda function event source mappings such as DynamoDB and Kinesis stream events via the Ansible framework. These event source mappings are relevant only in the AWS Lambda pull model, where AWS Lambda invokes the function. It is idempotent and supports “Check” mode. Use module community.aws.lambda to manage the lambda function itself and community.aws.lambda_alias to manage function aliases.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许通过Ansible框架管理AWS Lambda函数事件源映射，例如DynamoDB和Kinesis流事件。这些事件源映射仅在AWS Lambda调用模型的AWS Lambda拉模型中相关。它是幂等的，并支持“检查”模式。使用模块community.aws.lambda来管理lambda函数本身，并使用community.aws.lambda_alias来管理函数别名。

trans-unit.source: This module allows the management of AWS Lambda function event source mappings such as DynamoDB and Kinesis stream events via the Ansible framework. These event source mappings are relevant only in the AWS Lambda pull model, where AWS Lambda invokes the function. It is idempotent and supports “Check” mode. Use module lambda to manage the lambda function itself and lambda_alias to manage function aliases.

trans-unit.source: This module allows the management of AWS Lambda functions aliases via the Ansible framework. It is idempotent and supports “Check” mode. Use module community.aws.lambda to manage the lambda function itself and community.aws.lambda_event to manage event source mappings.

trans-unit.source: This module allows the management of AWS Lambda policy statements. It is idempotent and supports “Check” mode. Use module lambda to manage the lambda function itself, lambda_alias to manage function aliases, lambda_event to manage event source mappings such as Kinesis streams, execute_lambda to execute a lambda function and lambda_info to gather information relating to one or more lambda functions.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许管理AWS Lambda策略语句。它是幂等的，并支持“检查”模式。使用模块lambda管理lambda函数本身，使用lambda_alias管理函数别名，使用lambda_event管理事件源映射（如Kinesis流），execute_lambda执行lambda函数，使用lambda_info收集与一个或多个lambda函数有关的信息。

trans-unit.source: This module allows the user to configure data on RESTCONF enabled devices.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许用户在启用RESTCONF的设备上配置数据。

trans-unit.source: This module allows the user to create, delete and update virtual cloud networks(VCNs) in OCI. The complete Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Ansible Modules can be downloaded from https://github.com/oracle/oci-ansible-modules/releases.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许用户在OCI中创建，删除和更新虚拟云网络（VCN）。可以从https://github.com/oracle/oci-ansible-modules/releases下载完整的Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Ansible模块。

trans-unit.source: This module allows the user to execute NETCONF RPC requests as defined by IETF RFC standards as well as proprietary requests.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许用户执行IETF RFC标准定义的NETCONF RPC请求以及专有请求。

trans-unit.source: This module allows the user to fetch configuration and state data from NETCONF enabled network devices.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许用户从支持NETCONF的网络设备中获取配置和状态数据。

trans-unit.source: This module allows the user to fetch configuration and state data from RESTCONF enabled devices.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许用户从启用RESTCONF的设备中获取配置和状态数据。

trans-unit.source: This module allows the user to manage S3 buckets and the objects within them. Includes support for creating and deleting both objects and buckets, retrieving objects as files or strings and generating download links. This module has a dependency on boto3 and botocore.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许用户管理S3 buckets和其中的对象。包括支持创建和删除对象和桶,以文件或字符串形式检索对象,以及生成下载链接。该模块对boto3和botocore有依赖性。

trans-unit.source: This module allows the user to manage sending authorization policies associated with an SES identity (email or domain).
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许用户管理与SES身份(电子邮件或域名)相关联的发送授权策略。

trans-unit.source: This module allows the user to manage verified email and domain identity for SES.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许用户为SES管理验证的电子邮件和域名身份。

trans-unit.source: This module allows the user to send a configuration XML file to a netconf device, and detects if there was a configuration change.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许用户发送一个XML文件到netconf设备,并检测是否有配置变化。

trans-unit.source: This module allows to add and remove members to/from a group, or change a member’s access level in a group on GitLab.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许在组中添加成员或从组中删除成员，或者在GitLab上更改组中成员的访问级别。

trans-unit.source: This module allows to assign, protect, follow up, set status, and assign closing reason to QRadar Offenses
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许分配、保护、跟进、设置状态和分配关闭原因给QRadar犯罪。

trans-unit.source: This module allows to change the node’s role, its availability, and to modify, add or remove node labels.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许更改节点的角色，其可用性以及修改，添加或删除节点标签。

trans-unit.source: This module allows to create a QRadar Offense note
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许创建一个QRadar进攻笔记。

trans-unit.source: This module allows to manage dns records on a univention corporate server (UCS). It uses the python API of the UCS to create a new object or edit it.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许在univention企业服务器(UCS)上管理dns记录,它使用UCS的python API来创建新的对象或编辑。它使用UCS的python API来创建一个新的对象或编辑它。

trans-unit.source: This module allows to manage dns zones on a univention corporate server (UCS). It uses the python API of the UCS to create a new object or edit it.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许在univention企业服务器(UCS)上管理dns区域。它使用UCS的python API来创建一个新的对象或编辑它。

trans-unit.source: This module allows to manage posix users on a univention corporate server (UCS). It uses the python API of the UCS to create a new object or edit it.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许在univention企业服务器(UCS)上管理posix用户,它使用UCS的python API来创建新的对象或编辑。它使用UCS的python API来创建一个新的对象或编辑它。

trans-unit.source: This module allows to manage samba shares on a univention corporate server (UCS). It uses the python API of the UCS to create a new object or edit it.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许在univention企业服务器(UCS)上管理samba共享。它使用UCS的python API来创建一个新的对象或编辑它。

trans-unit.source: This module allows to manage user groups on a univention corporate server (UCS). It uses the python API of the UCS to create a new object or edit it.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许在univention企业服务器(UCS)上管理用户组。它使用UCS的python API来创建一个新的对象或编辑它。

trans-unit.source: This module allows to obtain information about one or many QRadar Offenses, with filter options
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许获取一个或多个QRadar罪行的信息,并有过滤选项。

trans-unit.source: This module allows users to manage their objects/buckets in Google Cloud Storage. It allows upload and download operations and can set some canned permissions. It also allows retrieval of URLs for objects for use in playbooks, and retrieval of string contents of objects. This module requires setting the default project in GCS prior to playbook usage. See https://developers.google.com/storage/docs/reference/v1/apiversion1 for information about setting the default project.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许用户在Google Cloud Storage中管理其对象/存储桶。它允许上载和下载操作，并可以设置一些固定的权限。它还允许检索用于剧本的对象的URL，以及检索对象的字符串内容。此模块要求在使用Playbook之前在GCS中设置默认项目。有关设置默认项目的信息，请参见https://developers.google.com/storage/docs/reference/v1/apiversion1。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to add a language, remote a language or change the trust relationship with a PostgreSQL database.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块允许你添加语言,远程语言或改变与PostgreSQL数据库的信任关系。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to add, remove or modify Keycloak groups via the Keycloak REST API. It requires access to the REST API via OpenID Connect; the user connecting and the client being used must have the requisite access rights. In a default Keycloak installation, admin-cli and an admin user would work, as would a separate client definition with the scope tailored to your needs and a user having the expected roles.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您通过Keycloak REST API添加、删除或修改Keycloak组。它需要通过OpenID Connect访问REST API;连接的用户和使用的客户端必须具有必要的访问权限。在默认的Keycloak安装中,admin-cli和一个管理员用户可以工作,一个单独的客户端定义也可以工作,其范围根据您的需求定制,用户具有预期的角色。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to copy the running configuration of a switch over its startup configuration. It is recommended to use this module shortly after any major configuration changes so they persist after a switch restart. This module uses SSH to manage network device configuration. The results of the operation will be placed in a directory named ‘results’ that must be created by the user in their local directory to where the playbook is run.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您在其启动配置上复制交换机的运行配置。建议在进行任何重大配置更改后立即使用此模块，以使它们在交换机重启后仍然有效。该模块使用SSH来管理网络设备配置。操作结果将放置在名为“结果”的目录中，该目录必须由用户在运行剧本的本地目录中创建。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to create and delete devices in CA Spectrum https://www.ca.com/us/products/ca-spectrum.html.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您在CA Spectrum https://www.ca.com/us/products/ca-spectrum.html中创建和删除设备。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to create and update object-group network/service on Cisco ASA device.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您在Cisco ASA设备上创建和更新对象组网络/服务。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to create or restore a volume snapshot. This module has a dependency on profitbricks >= 1.0.0
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您创建或还原卷快照。此模块依赖于> 1.0.0的Profitbricks

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to create, modify and delete Zabbix actions.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您创建、修改和删除Zabbix操作。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to create, modify and delete Zabbix host entries and associated group and template data.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您创建、修改和删除Zabbix主机条目以及相关的组和模板数据。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to create, modify and delete Zabbix map entries, using Graphviz binaries and text description written in DOT language. Nodes of the graph will become map elements and edges will become links between map elements. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DOT_(graph_description_language) and https://www.graphviz.org/ for details. Inspired by http://blog.zabbix.com/maps-for-the-lazy/.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您使用Graphviz二进制文件和以DOT语言编写的文本描述来创建，修改和删除Zabbix地图条目。图的节点将成为地图元素，而边缘将成为地图元素之间的链接。有关详细信息，请参见https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DOT_(graph_description_language）和https://www.graphviz.org/。受http://blog.zabbix.com/maps-for-the-lazy/启发。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to create, modify and delete Zabbix media types.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您创建、修改和删除Zabbix媒体类型。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to create, modify and delete Zabbix screens and associated graph data.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您创建,修改和删除Zabbix屏幕和相关的图形数据。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to create, modify and delete Zabbix users.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您创建、修改和删除Zabbix用户。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to create, modify and delete Zabbix value maps.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您创建、修改和删除Zabbix值映射。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to create, modify, delete and dump Zabbix templates.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您创建、修改、删除和转储Zabbix模板。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to create, modify, get and delete Zabbix proxy entries.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您创建、修改、获取和删除Zabbix代理条目。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to create, update, or delete cron variable definitions.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您创建、更新或删除cron变量定义。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to define one or more LDAP domains identified uniquely by identifier to use for authentication. Authorization is determined by role_mappings, in that different groups of users may be given different (or no), access to certain aspects of the system and API.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您定义一个或多个由标识符唯一标识的 LDAP域，以用于身份验证。授权是由role_mappings确定的，因为可以为不同的用户组提供不同（或没有）访问系统和API某些方面的权限。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to gather various information about ONTAP configuration
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您收集有关ONTAP配置的各种信息。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to gather various information about ONTAP configuration using REST APIs
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您使用REST API收集有关ONTAP配置的各种信息。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to manipulate login banner and motd for a vserver
trans-unit.target: 这个模块允许你操作vserver的登录横幅和motd。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to manipulate motd for a vserver
trans-unit.target: 这个模块允许你对vserver的motd进行操作。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to modify the running configuration of a switch. It provides a way to execute a single CNOS command on a network device by evaluating the current running configuration and executing the command only if the specific settings have not been already configured. The CNOS command is passed as an argument of the method. This module functions the same as the cnos_command module. The only exception is that following inventory variable can be specified [“condition = <flag string>”] When this inventory variable is specified as the variable of a task, the command is executed for the network element that matches the flag string. Usually, commands are executed across a group of network devices. When there is a requirement to skip the execution of the command on one or more devices, it is recommended to use this module. This module uses SSH to manage network device configuration.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您修改交换机的运行配置。通过评估当前运行的配置并仅在尚未配置特定设置的情况下执行命令，它提供了一种在网络设备上执行单个CNOS命令的方法。 CNOS命令作为方法的参数传递。该模块的功能与cnos_command模块相同。唯一的例外是可以指定以下清单变量[“ condition = <flag string>”]当将此清单变量指定为任务的变量时，将为与该标志字符串匹配的网络元素执行该命令。通常，命令在一组网络设备上执行。如果需要在一个或多个设备上跳过命令的执行，建议使用此模块。该模块使用SSH来管理网络设备配置。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to reset a switch’s startup configuration. The method provides a way to reset the startup configuration to its factory settings. This is helpful when you want to move the switch to another topology as a new network device. This module uses SSH to manage network device configuration. The result of the operation can be viewed in results directory.
trans-unit.target: 该模块使您可以重置交换机的启动配置。该方法提供了一种将启动配置重置为其出厂设置的方法。当您要将交换机作为新的网络设备移动到另一个拓扑时，这很有用。该模块使用SSH来管理网络设备配置。可以在结果目录中查看操作结果。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to restart the switch using the current startup configuration. The module is usually invoked after the running configuration has been saved over the startup configuration. This module uses SSH to manage network device configuration. The results of the operation can be viewed in results directory.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您使用当前的启动配置重新启动交换机。该模块通常在运行中的配置保存在启动配置上后调用。该模块使用SSH管理网络设备配置。操作的结果可以在结果目录下查看。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to run this task on your own schedule, so you incur the CPU hit at some more convenient and controlled time.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块允许你按自己的计划运行这个任务,这样你就会在一些更方便、更可控的时间内招致CPU的打击。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to search for Zabbix host entries.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您搜索Zabbix主机条目。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to search for Zabbix hostgroup entries.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您搜索Zabbix主机组条目。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to search for Zabbix template.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您搜索Zabbix模板。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to search for Zabbix user entries.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您搜索Zabbix用户条目。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to see if a Zabbix host have no active alert to make actions on it. For this case use module Ansible ‘fail’ to exclude host in trouble.
trans-unit.target: 该模块使您可以查看Zabbix主机是否没有活动警报以对其执行操作。对于这种情况，使用模块Ansible'fail'排除有问题的主机。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to specify the 'file' option directly without any other options.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许你直接指定 "文件 "选项,而不需要任何其他选项。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to specify the name of the file directly without any other options.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许你直接指定文件的名称,不需要任何其他选项。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to view the switch running configuration. It executes the display running-config CLI command on a switch and returns a file containing the current running configuration of the target network device. This module uses SSH to manage network device configuration. The results of the operation will be placed in a directory named ‘results’ that must be created by the user in their local directory to where the playbook is run.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您查看交换机的运行配置。它在交换机上执行display running-config CLI命令，并返回一个包含目标网络设备当前运行配置的文件。该模块使用SSH来管理网络设备配置。操作结果将放置在名为“结果”的目录中，该目录必须由用户在运行剧本的本地目录中创建。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to work with Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) related configurations. The operators used are overloaded to ensure control over switch BGP configurations. This module is invoked using method with asNumber as one of its arguments. The first level of the BGP configuration allows to set up an AS number, with the following attributes going into various configuration operations under the context of BGP. After passing this level, there are eight BGP arguments that will perform further configurations. They are bgpArg1, bgpArg2, bgpArg3, bgpArg4, bgpArg5, bgpArg6, bgpArg7, and bgpArg8. For more details on how to use these arguments, see [Overloaded Variables]. This module uses SSH to manage network device configuration. The results of the operation will be placed in a directory named ‘results’ that must be created by the user in their local directory to where the playbook is run.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您使用与边界网关协议（BGP）相关的配置。所使用的运算符过载，以确保对交换机BGP配置的控制。使用asNumber作为其参数之一的方法调用此模块。 BGP配置的第一级允许设置AS编号，以下属性在BGP的上下文中进入各种配置操作。通过此级别后，将有八个BGP参数将执行进一步的配置。它们是bgpArg1，bgpArg2，bgpArg3，bgpArg4，bgpArg5，bgpArg6，bgpArg7和bgpArg8。有关如何使用这些参数的更多详细信息，请参见[重载变量]。该模块使用SSH来管理网络设备配置。操作结果将放置在名为“结果”的目录中，该目录必须由用户在运行剧本的本地目录中创建。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to work with access-lists on a Cisco ASA device.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您在Cisco ASA设备上使用访问列表。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to work with switch configurations. It provides a way to back up the running or startup configurations of a switch to a remote server. This is achieved by periodically saving a copy of the startup or running configuration of the network device to a remote server using FTP, SFTP, TFTP, or SCP. The first step is to create a directory from where the remote server can be reached. The next step is to provide the full file path of the location where the configuration will be backed up. Authentication details required by the remote server must be provided as well. This module uses SSH to manage network device configuration. The results of the operation will be placed in a directory named ‘results’ that must be created by the user in their local directory to where the playbook is run.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您使用交换机配置。它提供了一种将交换机的运行或启动配置备份到远程服务器的方法。这是通过使用FTP，SFTP，TFTP或SCP定期将网络设备的启动或运行配置的副本保存到远程服务器来实现的。第一步是创建一个目录，从该目录可以访问远程服务器。下一步是提供要备份配置的位置的完整文件路径。还必须提供远程服务器所需的身份验证详细信息。该模块使用SSH来管理网络设备配置。操作结果将放置在名为“结果”的目录中，该目录必须由用户在运行剧本的本地目录中创建。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to work with switch configurations. It provides a way to roll back configurations of a switch from a remote server. This is achieved by using startup or running configurations of the target device that were previously backed up to a remote server using FTP, SFTP, TFTP, or SCP. The first step is to create a directory from where the remote server can be reached. The next step is to provide the full file path of he backup configuration’s location. Authentication details required by the remote server must be provided as well. By default, this method overwrites the switch’s configuration file with the newly downloaded file. This module uses SSH to manage network device configuration. The results of the operation will be placed in a directory named ‘results’ that must be created by the user in their local directory to where the playbook is run.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您使用交换机配置。它提供了一种从远程服务器回滚交换机配置的方法。这是通过使用目标设备的启动或运行配置来实现的，这些配置先前已使用FTP，SFTP，TFTP或SCP备份到远程服务器。第一步是创建一个目录，从该目录可以访问远程服务器。下一步是提供备份配置位置的完整文件路径。还必须提供远程服务器所需的身份验证详细信息。默认情况下，此方法将使用新下载的文件覆盖交换机的配置文件。该模块使用SSH来管理网络设备配置。操作结果将放置在名为“结果”的目录中，该目录必须由用户在运行剧本的本地目录中创建。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to work with switch firmware images. It provides a way to download a firmware image to a network device from a remote server using FTP, SFTP, TFTP, or SCP. The first step is to create a directory from where the remote server can be reached. The next step is to provide the full file path of the image’s location. Authentication details required by the remote server must be provided as well. By default, this method makes the newly downloaded firmware image the active image, which will be used by the switch during the next restart. This module uses SSH to manage network device configuration. The results of the operation will be placed in a directory named ‘results’ that must be created by the user in their local directory to where the playbook is run.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您使用交换机固件映像。它提供了一种使用FTP，SFTP，TFTP或SCP从远程服务器将固件映像下载到网络设备的方法。第一步是创建一个目录，从该目录可以访问远程服务器。下一步是提供图像位置的完整文件路径。还必须提供远程服务器所需的身份验证详细信息。默认情况下，此方法使新下载的固件映像成为活动映像，该映像将在下次重启时由交换机使用。该模块使用SSH来管理网络设备配置。操作结果将放置在名为“结果”的目录中，该目录必须由用户在运行剧本的本地目录中创建。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to work with the running configuration of a switch. It provides a way to execute a set of CNOS commands on a switch by evaluating the current running configuration and executing the commands only if the specific settings have not been already configured. The configuration source can be a set of commands or a template written in the Jinja2 templating language. This module functions the same as the cnos_template module. The only exception is that the following inventory variable can be specified. [“condition = <flag string>”] When this inventory variable is specified as the variable of a task, the template is executed for the network element that matches the flag string. Usually, templates are used when commands are the same across a group of network devices. When there is a requirement to skip the execution of the template on one or more devices, it is recommended to use this module. This module uses SSH to manage network device configuration.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您使用交换机的运行配置。通过评估当前运行的配置并仅在尚未配置特定设置的情况下执行命令，它提供了一种在交换机上执行一组CNOS命令的方法。配置源可以是用Jinja2模板语言编写的一组命令或模板。该模块的功能与cnos_template模块相同。唯一的例外是可以指定以下清单变量。 [“ condition = <flag string>”]当将此清单变量指定为任务变量时，将为与该标志字符串匹配的网络元素执行模板。通常，当一组网络设备上的命令相同时，将使用模板。如果需要在一个或多个设备上跳过模板的执行，建议使用此模块。该模块使用SSH来管理网络设备配置。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to work with the running configuration of a switch. It provides a way to execute a set of CNOS commands on a switch by evaluating the current running configuration and executing the commands only if the specific settings have not been already configured. The configuration source can be a set of commands or a template written in the Jinja2 templating language. This module uses SSH to manage network device configuration. The results of the operation will be placed in a directory named ‘results’ that must be created by the user in their local directory to where the playbook is run.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您使用交换机的运行配置。通过评估当前运行的配置并仅在尚未配置特定设置的情况下执行命令，它提供了一种在交换机上执行一组CNOS命令的方法。配置源可以是用Jinja2模板语言编写的一组命令或模板。该模块使用SSH来管理网络设备配置。操作结果将放置在名为“结果”的目录中，该目录必须由用户在运行剧本的本地目录中创建。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to work with virtual Link Aggregation Groups (vLAG) related configurations. The operators used are overloaded to ensure control over switch vLAG configurations. Apart from the regular device connection related attributes, there are four vLAG arguments which are overloaded variables that will perform further configurations. They are vlagArg1, vlagArg2, vlagArg3, and vlagArg4. For more details on how to use these arguments, see [Overloaded Variables]. This module uses SSH to manage network device configuration. The results of the operation will be placed in a directory named ‘results’ that must be created by the user in their local directory to where the playbook is run.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您使用与虚拟链路聚合组（vLAG）相关的配置。所使用的操作员很忙，无法确保对交换机vLAG配置的控制。除了与常规设备连接相关的属性外，还有四个vLAG参数，它们是将执行进一步配置的重载变量。它们是vlagArg1，vlagArg2，vlagArg3和vlagArg4。有关如何使用这些参数的更多详细信息，请参见[重载变量]。该模块使用SSH来管理网络设备配置。操作结果将放置在名为“结果”的目录中，该目录必须由用户在运行剧本的本地目录中创建。

trans-unit.source: This module also returns the pg_hba info. You can use this module to only retrieve it by only specifying dest. The info can be found in the returned data under key pg_hba, being a list, containing a dict per rule.
trans-unit.target: 该模块还返回pg_hba信息。您可以仅通过指定dest来使用此模块来检索它。该信息可以在返回的数据pg_hba下找到，该数据是列表pg_hba，其中包含每个规则的字典。

trans-unit.source: This module also support running commands in configuration mode in raw command style.
trans-unit.target: 该模块还支持在配置模式下以原始命令方式运行命令。

trans-unit.source: This module also supports Ansible check mode, which has the same effect as setting state=searched
trans-unit.target: 该模块还支持Ansible检查模式,该模式与设置state=searched的效果是一样的。

trans-unit.source: This module also works with local connections for legacy playbooks.
trans-unit.target: 此模块还可以与旧版剧本的 local 连接一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This module also works with network_cli connections and with local connections for legacy playbooks.
trans-unit.target: 该模块还可以与 network_cli 连接以及旧版剧本的 local 连接一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This module asserts that given expressions are true with an optional custom message.
trans-unit.target: 该模块通过一个可选的自定义消息来断言给定的表达式为真。

trans-unit.source: This module assumes English error messages for the ‘createcachetable’ command to detect table existence, unfortunately.
trans-unit.target: 不幸的是，该模块假定英文错误消息“ createcachetable”命令用于检测表的存在。

trans-unit.source: This module attempts to adhere to the behavior of the command line tool as much as possible.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块试图尽可能地遵守命令行工具的行为。

trans-unit.source: This module attempts to install the software immediately, which may trigger a reboot.
trans-unit.target: 该模块试图立即安装软件,这可能会触发重启。

trans-unit.source: This module authenticates to oVirt/RHV engine and creates SSO token, which should be later used in all other oVirt/RHV modules, so all modules don’t need to perform login and logout. This module returns an Ansible fact called ovirt_auth. Every module can use this fact as auth parameter, to perform authentication.
trans-unit.target: 该模块向oVirt / RHV引擎进行身份验证并创建SSO令牌，该令牌稍后应在所有其他oVirt / RHV模块中使用，因此所有模块均无需执行登录和注销操作。该模块返回一个称为ovirt_auth的Ansible事实。每个模块都可以将此事实用作 auth 参数，以执行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: This module boots a system through its HP iLO interface. The boot media can be one of: cdrom, floppy, hdd, network or usb.
trans-unit.target: 该模块通过HP iLO接口启动系统。启动介质可以是:CDROM、软盘、硬盘、网络或USB之一。

trans-unit.source: This module bypasses the play host loop and only runs once for all the hosts in the play, if you need it to iterate use a loop construct. If you need to dynamically add all hosts targeted by a playbook for later use, the group_by module is potentially a better choice.
trans-unit.target: 该模块绕过播放主机循环，并且如果需要使用 loop 构造进行迭代，则仅对播放中的所有主机运行一次。如果您需要动态添加剧本所针对的所有主机以供以后使用，则 group_by 模块可能是一个更好的选择。

trans-unit.source: This module bypasses the play host loop and only runs once for all the hosts in the play, if you need it to iterate use a with-loop construct.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块绕过了播放主机循环,并且只对播放中的所有主机运行一次,如果你需要它迭代,可以使用with-loop结构。

trans-unit.source: This module can add or remove tags https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/label-or-tag-resources#tags to/from GCE instances. Use ‘instance_pattern’ to update multiple instances in a specify zone.
trans-unit.target: 此模块可以向GCE实例添加标签https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/label-or-tag-resources#tag或从GCE实例删除标签。使用'instance_pattern'更新指定区域中的多个实例。

trans-unit.source: This module can add, remove, update, query and execute arbitrary command in routeros via API.
trans-unit.target: 该模块可以通过API在routeros中添加、删除、更新、查询和执行任意命令。

trans-unit.source: This module can allocate or release an EIP.
trans-unit.target: 该模块可以分配或释放一个EIP。

trans-unit.source: This module can also be used to move an ESXi host to a cluster or folder, or vice versa, within the same datacenter.
trans-unit.target: 该模块还可用于在同一数据中心内将 ESXi 主机移动到群集或文件夹,或反之。

trans-unit.source: This module can also be used to wait for a regex match a string to be present in a file.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块也可以用来等待一个regex匹配的字符串出现在文件中。

trans-unit.source: This module can also be used to wait for a regex match string to be present in a file.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块也可以用来等待文件中出现一个regex匹配字符串。

trans-unit.target: 该模块可以将EIP与实例或网络接口进行关联/解除关联。

trans-unit.target: 该模块可用于Cross-vCenter vm/template克隆。

trans-unit.target: 该模块可用于调用Avi REST API中定义的任何资源。https://avinetworks.com/

trans-unit.target: 该模块可用于将OSPF协议添加到vRouter,并从vRouter中移除OSPF协议。

trans-unit.source: This module can be used to create new virtual machines from templates or other virtual machines, manage power state of virtual machine such as power on, power off, suspend, shutdown, reboot, restart etc., modify various virtual machine components like network, disk, customization etc., rename a virtual machine and remove a virtual machine with associated components.

trans-unit.target: 该模块可用于从OVF或OVA文件部署VMware虚拟机。

trans-unit.source: This module can be used to enable or disable Hyperthreading optimization for ESXi host systems in given vCenter infrastructure.

trans-unit.target: 此模块可以从包含原始磁盘数据的压缩压缩tarball或任何区域中现有的分离磁盘中创建和删除GCE专用映像。https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/images

trans-unit.source: This module can create and destroy Google Compute Engine loadbalancer and httphealthcheck resources. The primary LB resource is the load_balancer resource and the health check parameters are all prefixed with httphealthcheck. The full documentation for Google Compute Engine load balancing is at https://developers.google.com/compute/docs/load-balancing/. However, the ansible module simplifies the configuration by following the libcloud model. Full install/configuration instructions for the gce* modules can be found in the comments of ansible/test/gce_tests.py.
trans-unit.target: 此模块可以创建和销毁Google Compute Engine loadbalancer httphealthcheck 和httphealthcheck资源。主要的LB资源是 load_balancer 资源，并且运行状况检查参数均带有httphealthcheck前缀。有关Google Compute Engine负载平衡的完整文档，请访问https://developers.google.com/compute/docs/load-balancing/。但是，ansible模块通过遵循libcloud模型简化了配置。有关gce *模块的完整安装/配置说明，请参见ansible / test / gce_tests.py的注释。

trans-unit.source: This module can create and destroy Google Compute Engine networks and firewall rules https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/networking. The name parameter is reserved for referencing a network while the fwname parameter is used to reference firewall rules. IPv4 Address ranges must be specified using the CIDR http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Classless_Inter-Domain_Routing format. Full install/configuration instructions for the gce* modules can be found in the comments of ansible/test/gce_tests.py.
trans-unit.target: 此模块可以创建和销毁Google Compute Engine网络和防火墙规则https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/networking。的名称参数保留给而引用网络fwname参数用于引用防火墙规则。必须使用CIDR http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Classless_Inter-Domain_Routing格式指定IPv4地址范围。有关gce *模块的完整安装/配置说明，请参见ansible / test / gce_tests.py的注释。

trans-unit.source: This module can create and destroy unformatted GCE persistent disks https://developers.google.com/compute/docs/disks#persistentdisks. It also supports attaching and detaching disks from running instances. Full install/configuration instructions for the gce* modules can be found in the comments of ansible/test/gce_tests.py.
trans-unit.target: 此模块可以创建和销毁未格式化的GCE永久磁盘https://developers.google.com/compute/docs/disks#persistentdisks。它还支持将磁盘与正在运行的实例连接和分离。有关gce *模块的完整安装/配置说明，请参见ansible / test / gce_tests.py的注释。

trans-unit.source: This module can create, update, revert and delete snapshots
trans-unit.target: 该模块可以创建、更新、恢复和删除快照。

trans-unit.source: This module can currently only create distributors and importers on rpm repositories. Contributions to support other repo types are welcome.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块目前只能在 rpm 仓库上创建分销商和进口商。欢迎为支持其他类型的仓库做出贡献。

trans-unit.source: This module can force a rescan of the hosts HBA subsystem which is needed when wanting to mount a new datastore.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块可以强制重新扫描主机的HBA子系统,当想要挂载一个新的数据存储时,需要这样做。

trans-unit.source: This module can install new and updated packages on remote devices running Junos. The module will compare the specified package with the one running on the remote device and install the specified version if there is a mismatch
trans-unit.target: 该模块可以在运行Junos的远程设备上安装新的和更新的软件包。该模块会将指定的软件包与远程设备上运行的软件包进行比较,并在不匹配的情况下安装指定的版本。

trans-unit.source: This module can manage a pacemaker cluster and nodes from Ansible using the pacemaker cli.
trans-unit.target: 该模块可以使用 pacemaker cli 从 Ansible 管理起搏器集群和节点。

trans-unit.source: This module can manage both standard username/password credentials as well as certificate credentials.
trans-unit.target: 该模块既可以管理标准的用户名/密码凭证,也可以管理证书凭证。

trans-unit.source: This module can register or unregister VMs to the inventory.
trans-unit.target: 该模块可以将虚拟机注册或取消注册到库存。

trans-unit.source: This module can take a lot of time to deploy vCMP guests. This is an intrinsic limitation of the vCMP system because it is booting real VMs on the BIG-IP device. This boot time is very similar in length to the time it takes to boot VMs on any other virtualization platform; public or private.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块可能需要大量的时间来部署vCMP客体。这是vCMP系统的内在限制,因为它是在BIG-IP设备上启动真实的虚拟机。这个启动时间的长度与在任何其他虚拟化平台上启动虚拟机所需的时间非常相似;无论是公共的还是私有的。

trans-unit.source: This module can take a lot of time to deploy vCMP guests. This is an intrinsic limitation of the vCMP system, because it is booting real VMs on the BIG-IP device. This boot time is very similar in length to the time it takes to boot VMs on any other virtualization platform; public or private.

trans-unit.target: infini_map与infini_host是分开实现的,允许ansible在不删除主机的情况下删除映射或使其消失。

trans-unit.target: 该模块可创建或删除要在IBM Spectrum Accelerate系列存储系统上使用的池。

trans-unit.target: 该模块可以在网络设备上创建或更新用户帐号。它允许游戏本管理单个用户名或当前运行配置中的用户名集合。它还支持从配置中清除没有明确定义的用户名。

trans-unit.target: 此模块取决于 psutil Python库（版本4.0.0及更高版本）， dconf ， dbus-send 和 dbus-run-session 二进制文件。根据您使用的发行版，可能需要安装其他软件包才能使用这些软件包。

trans-unit.source: This module does not behave like other modules that you might include in roles where referencing files or templates first looks in the role’s files or templates directory. trans-unit.source: This module does not broadcast change events. This means that the minority of windows applications which can have their environment changed without restarting will not be notified and therefore will need restarting to pick up new environment settings.
trans-unit.target: 该模块不广播更改事件。这意味着少数可以在不重启的情况下改变环境的windows应用程序将不会得到通知,因此需要重启以获取新的环境设置。

trans-unit.source: This module does not broadcast change events. This means that the minority of windows applications which can have their environment changed without restarting will not be notified and therefore will need restarting to pick up new environment settings. User level environment variables will require the user to log out and in again before they become available.
trans-unit.target: 该模块不广播更改事件。这意味着少数可以在不重启的情况下改变环境的windows应用程序将不会得到通知,因此需要重启以获取新的环境设置。用户级别的环境变量需要用户注销后再登录才能使用。

trans-unit.source: This module does not create interfaces, it expects the interfaces to already exists and can only modify them.
trans-unit.target: 该模块不创建接口,它希望接口已经存在,只能修改接口。

trans-unit.source: This module does not currently allow changing of options for a zone that is already been created.
trans-unit.target: 该模块目前不允许更改已经创建的区段的选项。

trans-unit.source: This module does not currently interact with AWS-provided certificates. It currently only manages certificates provided to AWS by the user.

trans-unit.source: This module does not currently support all Robocopy flags.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块目前不支持所有Robocopy标志。

trans-unit.source: This module does not force registry settings to be in the state described in the file. If registry settings have been modified externally the module will merge the contents of the file but continue to report differences on subsequent runs.
trans-unit.target: 本模块不会强制注册表设置处于文件中描述的状态。如果注册表设置已被外部修改,该模块将合并文件内容,但在随后的运行中继续报告差异。

trans-unit.target: 该模块不处理6400、6800、8400或8800硬件平台上的BIG-IPs系统。

trans-unit.source: This module does not handle the saving and/or loading of rules, but rather only manipulates the current rules that are present in memory. This is the same as the behaviour of the iptables and ip6tables command which this module uses internally.
trans-unit.target: 该模块不处理规则的保存和/或加载，而仅处理内存中存在的当前规则。这与该模块在内部使用的 iptables 和 ip6tables 命令的行为相同。

trans-unit.source: This module does not include the “max time” or “restrict to blade” options.

trans-unit.target: 该模块不支持check_mode。

trans-unit.source: This module enables you to enable SNMP on cluster nodes. When you enable SNMP, the action applies to all nodes in the cluster, and the values that are passed replace, in whole, all values set in any previous call to this module.
trans-unit.target: 该模块可以让你在集群节点上启用SNMP。当您启用SNMP时,该操作适用于集群中的所有节点,并且传递的值将全部替换之前调用本模块时设置的所有值。

trans-unit.source: This module ensures a particular line is in a file, or replace an existing line using a back-referenced regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块可以确保文件中的某一行,或者使用一个反向引用的正则表达式替换现有的一行。

trans-unit.source: This module executes AWS Lambda functions, allowing synchronous and asynchronous invocation.
trans-unit.target: 该模块执行AWS Lambda函数,允许同步和异步调用。

trans-unit.source: This module fails the progress with a custom message.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块的进度失败了,有一个自定义消息。

trans-unit.source: This module fetches data from the Open API in Alicloud. The module must be called from within the ECS instance itself.
trans-unit.target: 该模块从Alicloud的Open API中获取数据。该模块必须从ECS实例本身内部调用。

trans-unit.source: This module fetches data from the instance metadata endpoint in ec2 as per https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/ec2-instance-metadata.html.
trans-unit.target: This module fetches data from the instance metadata endpoint in ec2 as per https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/ec2-instance-metadata.html.

trans-unit.source: This module fetches data from the instance metadata endpoint in ec2 as per https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/ec2-instance-metadata.html. The module must be called from within the EC2 instance itself.
trans-unit.target: 该模块根据https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/ec2-instance-metadata.html从ec2中的实例元数据终结点获取数据。必须从EC2实例本身内部调用该模块。

trans-unit.source: This module fetches data from the metadata API in CloudStack. The module must be called from within the instance itself.
trans-unit.target: 该模块可从 CloudStack 中的元数据 API 获取数据。必须从实例本身内部调用该模块。

trans-unit.source: This module fetches the system id from RHN.
trans-unit.target: 该模块从RHN获取系统ID。

trans-unit.source: This module gathers information on a specific system using its HP iLO interface. These information includes hardware and network related information useful for provisioning (e.g. macaddress, uuid).
trans-unit.target: 该模块使用其HP iLO接口收集特定系统的信息。这些信息包括与硬件和网络相关的信息,对配置有用(如macaddress,uuid)。

trans-unit.source: This module generates a self-signed certificate that can be used by GlobalProtect client, SSL connector, or
trans-unit.target: 该模块生成的自签名证书可用于GlobalProtect客户端、SSL连接器或

trans-unit.source: This module gets the status of an asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: 该模块获取异步任务的状态。

trans-unit.source: This module gives access to resources that are not supported via Ansible modules.
trans-unit.target: 该模块可以访问不通过Ansible模块支持的资源。

trans-unit.source: This module handles adding node to the Skydive topology.
trans-unit.target: 该模块处理添加节点到Skydive拓扑结构。

trans-unit.source: This module handles authenticating to Kubernetes clusters requiring explicit authentication procedures, meaning ones where a client logs in (obtains an authentication token), performs API operations using said token and then logs out (revokes the token). An example of a Kubernetes distribution requiring this module is OpenShift.
trans-unit.target: 该模块处理对需要显式身份验证过程的Kubernetes集群的身份验证，这意味着客户端登录（获取身份验证令牌），使用所述令牌执行API操作然后注销（撤销令牌）的过程。需要此模块的Kubernetes发行版的一个示例是OpenShift。

trans-unit.source: This module handles both operations, get a specific object and get several objects, For getting a specific object use the parameter ‘name’.
trans-unit.target: 该模块处理这两种操作，获取一个特定的对象并获取多个对象，要获取特定的对象，请使用参数“名称”。

trans-unit.source: This module handles setting up edges between two nodes based on the relationship type to the Skydive topology.
trans-unit.target: 该模块处理根据关系类型设置两个节点之间的边缘与Skydive拓扑的关系。

trans-unit.source: This module handles the saving and/or loading of rules. This is the same as the behaviour of the iptables-save and iptables-restore (or ip6tables-save and ip6tables-restore for IPv6) commands which this module uses internally.
trans-unit.target: This module handles the saving and/or loading of rules. This is the same as the behaviour of the iptables-save and iptables-restore (or ip6tables-save and ip6tables-restore for IPv6) commands which this module uses internally.

trans-unit.target: This module has a corresponding action plugin.
